Name: Waters of Chaos
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of coin-sized slice of lime zest.
Review: Robust flavours of overproof rum and Chartreuse combine with Dutch genever in this Last Word -like cocktail.
History: Created by yours truly and named after the words of the track Argha Noah by Nightmares on Wax.
Nutrition: One serving of Waters of Chaos contains 167 calories
